about_the_game:
Adorable Witch 3 is a level puzzle game. Players need to control various mechanisms in the level to help the witches and elves of the Magic Academy get flowers and pass the apprentice witch test. Players need to guide the pure water to fall on the seeds by destroying the stone slabs in the scene to ensure the growth of the seeds, so that the witches can get the flowers grown from the seeds. At the same time, make sure that the water is not polluted by evil spirits.

  • In the game, you will experience:
  • Fun and creative gameplay
  • Help the Witch of Witch Academia to pass the test
  • The soft and cute Q version of elves and witches will go through the level with you
  • Fresh and lovely game style
  • Ten exquisite dynamic CG
  • More beautiful achievements and background display pictures are waiting for you to obtain.
